NAME: Sankalp Bose
ABOUT:
• 10 years of software development experience covering Java Backend development, embedded sys- tems, enterprise storage systems and kernel programming.
• 3 years of experience as technical team lead driving projects end to end including feasibility analysis, technical strategy, prototyping and streamlining of tasks.
• Led design and architecture of key backend systems for Amazon’s Locker Product using Amazon Web Services like EC2, S3, Cloudwatch, DynamoDB, IAM, SNS, Kinesis, Polly.
• Worked as Performance specialist at Netapp and Oracle responsible for resolving performance bot- tlenecks across multiple modules like Filesystems, RAID, Network Protocols.
• Worked as Device driver developer (BSP) and Filesystem developer for embedded Linux platforms for Qualcomm and Tuxera respectively.
• Proven record as a versatile problem solver (top 5% among Python programmers at Hackerearth) and a quick learner with strong grasp of CS fundamentals.
